title: Spring Dogs : Ultimate Multiplayer Battle Royale
notes: Steam shows Very Positive (81% of 11). SteamDB shows 78.53% positive; tiny sample.
raw_comment: 3D platform racing. 8 local players or up to 16 players in teams of two. 🎮 16 PS4/PS5 with Steam Input off. 🎮 4 XBox. (16 via virtual PS4 using reWASD.) ⌨ 2 on keyboard. 🖥️ Split screen.
